summary:
My value-add to a company`s success is the ability to quickly learn and see through business processes, while maintaining a highly accurate and time efficient way of working. I am goal oriented and self-motivated with keen attention to details. I like working with set requirements, but I am not afraid to challenge the status quo to achieve operational excellence.

I find my interest in:

•	Business Analysis, Management Reporting, Project Control
•	Structuring information, consolidating data
•	Project Management and Resource Management Related Tooling
•	Daily Operational Process Improvements
•	Learning new systems, broaden my knowledge

Others describe me as someone who:

•	Turns issues into solutions
•	Is proactive, always thinking ahead
•	Has an analytical mindset
•	Has integrity and is compliance-minded
•	Is a committed and diligent team player
•	Is reliable and gets things done

awards.title: Thank You Program Applause Award (Management) - Recognized for Care
awards.description: Dear Andrea, You stepped in as Cluster PMO from VHV when in Wilton the PMO officer on short term stopped. You fully supported the Top Cluster from VHV for the past 3-4 months, meaning the various cluster meetings but also progress reviews. Even with this challenge you managed to connect with the team fast and ensured continuity in the support, but also to let some things run smoother. At the start you indicated timeslots when not available, but fast your dedication was there and even on times not expected you were available to provide the support the cluster needed. You very quickly earned the respect of the Wilton EXE team members as well as the DM staff of Louis Lu. Your innate ability to understand a topic quickly proved valuable to our cluster. Your interfaces were so seamless that we did not notice that you were 3000 miles away. Thanks a lot Andrea!

awards.title: Thank You Program Applause Award (Management) - Recognized for Challenge
awards.description: With this Award we would like to thank you for your exceptional support over the last years. With your structured approach you were able to make the difference in managing our meetings, creating up-to-date finance overviews, SharePoint sites and in the preparation of our reports and presentations. Moreover, your drive for efficiency created time for you to take on an additional assignment of supporting the Technology program. Never afraid to ask, you kept on challenging us and our teams on our way of working, and the finance department on the quality/content of their reports, but always in a constructive and collaborative way! That definitely will help you in your next assignment in 0.55 program! Wishing you all the best in your future career at ASML!

awards.title: Thank You Program Good Work Award (Peer to Peer) - Recognized for Collaboration
awards.description: For the great collaboration with the Product Owner of STER 2.0 (project status reporting) in the phasing out of STER 1.0.

awards.title: Thank You Program Good Work Award (Peer to Peer) - Recognized for Ownership
awards.description: For the dedication, contribution and great attitude towards the PMO PM Competence Team by challenging the core-team to act and take ownership in bringing structure towards the PM competence. Additionally, with the Lessons Learned Repository having a direct impact on a business improvement.

awards.title: Silver CEO Award
awards.description: For the coordinated efforts to create new Global Professional Services Policy Handbook based on team brainstorms, alignment with other functions and management and creating and publishing all policies.

certifications.name: Language Certificate - Advanced Business English C1

courses.name: 2019 MS Projects Scheduling and Progress Tracking (ASML)

profile_positions.description: Where people work – the buildings, environment and facilities – play an important role in helping ASML achieve its business strategy and objectives. Corporate Real Estate (CRE) aligns the needs of businesses, people, technology and culture to create inspiring environments that foster innovation and collaboration. CRE Netherlands is responsible to plan, deliver, manage and operate the NL sites in a qualitative, safe and competitive way and in accordance with ASML’s and CRE’s strategic directives and ensures operational performance of real estate assets (uptime, CAPEX, OPEX, safety, sustainability, and business continuity). As CRE PMO I am part of the CRE Projects Team to support a group of professional Project Managers during the CRE Building Generation Process (BGP), while driving continuous improvements of the related processes.
profile_positions.title: Project Management Officer - Corporate Real Estate

profile_positions.description:
Within ASML the Program Management Office (PMO) is the recognized expert that drives world-class Program- and Project Management and is the competence owner of state-of-the-art project methodologies. As PMO within the EUV Business Line I am positioned as an independent team member of a business team that is responsible for the development of ASML`s state-of-the-art lithography machines. My mission is to enable effective decision making on all levels, drive the roll-out and embedding of project (program) standards and processes related to project planning, product generation process, reporting, change control, risk management and quality. Together with my PMO colleagues I drive, participate, lead and implement cross-PMO improvement projects in accordance with the PMO Roadmap. Furthermore, I provide guidance during the financial forecasting (budget) process and proactively assist regular financial management and reporting.

PMO Business Line EUV EXE (06/2021 - 06/2023)
   - EXE Body Layout Cluster
   - EXE Tools Cluster
   - EXE Top Cluster (WLT)
   - EXE Performance Cluster​
   - PMO Resource Management Competence Team
   - TAP KU Group EXE Representative
   - Support EXE Program with RM related activities​

PMO Business Line EUV NXE (05/2019 - 05/2021)
   - NXE Wafer Clamps Cluster
   - NXE Performance Cluster
   - PMO Project Management Competence Team​
   - Support NXE Technology Program with RM related activities
profile_positions.title: Project Management Officer - Business Line EUV

profile_positions.description: In lack of a fully implemented Project Service Automation (PSA) system at that time, I developed a comprehensive tool in Excel for capacity planning and a set of management reports for project, sales and business analysis. Furthermore, I improved the information flow from Projects to Finance, after which I was tasked to take care of the project related invoicing and bookkeeping. I assisted our Financial Controller with the month close activities, account reconciliations and I was also the backup for Accounts Payable whenever it was necessary to step in.
profile_positions.title: Project Administration Specialist

profile_positions.description: I contributed to the structural improvement and execution of the processes and procedures at the Global Professional Services (GPS) department of BWise®. The goal was to achieve operational excellence for the GPS organization and to gain better financial control over project related business. In this role, I gained experience in project planning optimization, project management reports, draft invoicing and basic project management. My most important contribution was the development of the GPS Handbook, which contained the policies and processes of the GPS organization, extended with tailor-made user guides of the related Nasdaq systems. This handbook helped BWise to comply with the Nasdaq Internal Control processes and Nasdaq recognized my work with a Silver CEO Award.
profile_positions.title: Sr. Project Support Officer

profile_positions.description: My primary focus was to optimize Sales Operations. Working together with the Global BWise® Sales Team gave me extensive experience in coordinating and compiling commercial proposals based on input from all relevant departments, processing order intakes and providing business analysis for management. Furthermore, I created a SharePoint Sales Portal and I was tasked with the coordination of the Miller Heiman Strategic Selling method. My biggest achievement is the development of the Sales Policies Handbook, which helped to comply with the Nasdaq Internal Control processes; and the optimization of the “response to tender” (RFx) process, which resulted in more and higher quality bids in a structured way.
profile_positions.title: Sales Operations Coordinator

profile_positions.description: I developed the localization and translation procedure of the company, while I acted as the translation coordinator for 25 languages involving more than 60 translators world-wide. I performed Sales and Marketing Support, assisted with strategic projects related to sales and marketing and created management reporting. I gained extensive Customer Support experience while being onsite during auctions and supporting bidders from all around the world remotely.
profile_positions.title: Sales Support Coordinator
